bibl.title: Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. Athens, 25-31 May 1986.
bibl.note: Les communications suivantes n'apparaissent que sous la forme de résumés. - I: Manfredo Manfredi, Notizia sul Corpus dei papiri filosofici, pp. 59-60; - Annette Harder, Callimachus' Aetia: A New Edition, p. 429. - II: Espen S. Ore, Information Technology and Papyrology, pp. 27-29, 1 fig.; - Francisca A.J. Hoogendijk, Official Correspondence of a Komogrammateus, p. 125 [P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 25855]; - Stuart R. Pickering, A Baptism Text in Greek and Old Nubian (P. Macquarie Inv. 374), p. 133; - Ludwig Koenen, Calendar Problems: on the Macedonian Calendar under Philopator and Epiphanes and on the Use of the Sothis Year for Religious Festivals, p. 209; - Peter van Minnen, Urban Craftsmen in Egyptian Society, p. 293; - Traianos Gagos, Some Thoughts on the Term "enapographos georgos" as Used in the Papyri, p. 301; - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, Zur erbrechtlichen Stellung der Ehegatten nach den Papyri, p. 361; - A.N. Oikonomides, The Capture of Ainos in Thrace by Ptolemy "The Son" and the Execution of Adaeus in PHaun. 6 I, 6-9, p. 403.
